summary: "Money Heist" is a Spanish TV show about a group of robbers led by a man called the Professor. They plan two big heists: one at the Royal Mint of Spain and another at the Bank of Spain. The story is told by one of the robbers, Tokyo, and uses flashbacks and time jumps to add excitement. Originally aired in 2017, Netflix made it popular worldwide. The show has five parts and has won many awards for its clever plot and characters. A famous Italian song from the show, "Bella ciao," became a big hit in Europe.
title: Money Heist
